item.title: 分析师称，如果特朗普赢得大选并提高关税，美国液化天然气出口收益将面临风险
item.description: 分析人士说，如果共和党人唐纳德-特朗普赢得总统大选，美国的液化天然气（LNG）出口商可能会面临新的障碍，因为尽管这位前总统承诺加快新能源许可的审批，但他提议对从中国进口的液化天然气征收 60% 的关税。【原文：U.S. exporters of liquefied natural gas (LNG) could face new hurdles if Republican Donald Trump wins the presidential election because of a proposed 60% tariff on imports from China, despite the former president's pledge to speed new energy permits, say analysts.】

item.title: 艾伯维上调 2024 年利润预期，主要药物 Skyrizi 和 Rinvoq 销售强劲
item.description: 艾伯维公司周三上调了年度盈利预期，因为其新型免疫学药物和主要癌症治疗药物的强劲销售帮助该公司第三季度盈利超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：AbbVie raised its annual profit forecast on Wednesday after strong sales of its newer immunology drugs and key cancer treatment helped the company beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter earnings.】

item.title: Garmin 上调全年指导目标，业绩超预期，需求有增无减
item.description: Garmin 周三上调了全年利润和营收预期，预计节假日前推出的一系列可穿戴产品将进一步拉动需求，这使得该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨了 9.5%。【原文：Garmin raised its full-year profit and revenue forecasts on Wednesday, expecting a slew of launches of wearable products ahead of the holiday season to drive demand further, sending the company's shares up 9.5% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪第三季度净利润增长 11.5
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪周三录得第三季度净利润增长11.5%，因其在政府以旧换新优惠政策的帮助下保持了强劲的销售势头。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD recorded a 11.5% rise in third-quarter net profit on Wednesday, as it maintained strong sales momentum helped by government trade-in incentives.】

item.title: 通用电气医疗保健公司第三季度利润超出预期，得益于美国对医疗设备的需求
item.description: 通用电气医疗保健技术公司（GE HealthCare Technologies）周三公布的季度利润超出预期，原因是美国对其医疗设备的强劲需求抵消了中国医疗保健行业因反腐行动而受到干扰导致的销售放缓。【原文：GE HealthCare Technologies beat estimates for quarterly profit on Wednesday as strong demand for its medical devices in the U.S. offset slowing sales in China due to disruptions in the country's healthcare sector because of an anti-corruption drive.】

item.title: 比亚迪任命前 Stellantis UK 首席执行官达维诺推动欧洲扩张
item.description: 中国汽车制造商比亚迪（BYD）周三表示，已任命前 Stellantis UK 首席执行官玛丽亚-格拉西亚-达维诺（Maria Grazia Davino）领导其在包括德国在内的一些欧洲国家的业务。【原文：BYD has appointed former Stellantis UK chief Maria Grazia Davino to lead its operations in a group of European countries including Germany, the Chinese automaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 谷歌、Reddit 和 Snap 财报显示需求强劲，数字广告销售商跳涨
item.description: 由于谷歌母公司 Alphabet、Reddit 和 Snap 盈利强劲，预示着在关键的假日季节到来之前，品牌支出稳健，网络广告销售商的股价周三大涨。【原文：Shares of online ad sellers surged on Wednesday as strong earnings from Google-parent Alphabet, Reddit and Snap signaled solid spending from brands ahead of the crucial holiday season.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国要求汽车制造商暂停在支持征收电动汽车关税的欧盟国家投资
item.description: 两位知情人士称，中国已通知其汽车制造商停止在支持对中国制造的电动汽车征收额外关税的欧洲国家进行大规模投资，此举可能会进一步分裂欧洲。【原文：China has told its automakers to halt big investment in European countries that support extra tariffs on Chinese-built electric vehicles, two people briefed about the matter said, a move likely to further divide Europe.】

item.title: 卡夫亨氏季度营收不及预期，原因是需求减弱
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）周三公布的季度收入降幅超过预期，原因是消费者对其品牌餐包和零食的需求持续疲软，转而购买价格更低的自有品牌替代品。【原文：Kraft Heinz on Wednesday posted a steeper-than-expected fall in quarterly revenue as demand stayed weak for its branded meal kits and snacks with consumers trading down to cheaper, private-label alternatives.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司的夏娃公司获得花旗银行 5000 万美元贷款，用于资助 "飞行汽车 "的开发
item.description: 电动飞机制造商伊夫公司（Eve）周三表示，已从花旗银行获得 5000 万美元贷款，以加强其资产负债表并支持其 "飞行汽车 "的开发。【原文：Electric aircraft maker Eve has obtained a $50 million loan from Citibank , strengthening its balance sheet and supporting the development of its "flying car," the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 减肥药需求飙升，礼来第三季度利润不佳
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周三公布的第三季度利润未能达到华尔街预期，尽管其减肥药的需求量急剧上升，但生产和收购相关成本上升也对利润造成了影响。【原文：Eli Lilly missed Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, even as demand for its weight-loss drug soared, hurt by higher manufacturing and acquisition-related costs.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒因需求放缓下调年度销售预期，股价下跌
item.description: 卡特彼勒（Caterpillar）周三表示，由于借贷成本上升和通胀胶着导致机械需求放缓，该公司预计全年营收将略低于此前的预期，从而导致其股价下跌 5.3%。【原文：Caterpillar said on Wednesday it expects full-year revenue to be slightly lower from its prior forecast as higher borrowing costs and sticky inflation led to a slowdown in machinery demand, sending the company's shares down 5.3%.】

item.title: 医疗保险业务强劲，Humana 季度利润超出预期
item.description: 本周三，受政府支持的老年人医疗保险（Medicare Advantage）业务强劲的推动，Humana 第三季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Humana beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, buoyed by strength in its government-backed Medicare Advantage insurance business for older adults.】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛任命 Stephane de La Faverie 为首席执行官
item.description: 化妆品巨头雅诗兰黛周三任命 Stephane de La Faverie 为新总裁兼首席执行官，自 2025 年 1 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Cosmetics giant Estee Lauder on Wednesday named Stephane de La Faverie as its new president and CEO, effective Jan. 1, 2025.】

item.title: 邦吉公司（Bunge）因销售量增加而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 谷物贸易商和加工商邦吉公司（Bunge）周三公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于销售量增加。【原文：Grain trader and processor Bunge beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by higher sales volumes.】

item.title: 早间竞价Alphabet 业绩超预期，国债反弹
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 公寓销售停滞不前，加拿大面临日益严重的置业危机
item.description: 六位经济学家和房地产经纪人告诉路透社记者，加拿大的住房所有权危机很可能在未来几年内进一步恶化，因为拟议的项目销售在历史最低水平上徘徊，阻碍了建设所需的资金。【原文：Canada's home ownership crisis is likely to worsen over the next few years as proposed project sales languish at historically low levels, stalling the funding needed for construction, half a dozen economists and realtors told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国托运人因第二次罢工风险而避开东海岸港口
item.description: 美国托运人正在避开东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸的港口，因为他们担心，如果这些贸易枢纽的 45,000 名码头工人的工会领袖不能在 1 月 15 日的最后期限前与雇主签订新合同，他们将再次举行罢工。【原文：U.S. shippers are steering clear of East and Gulf Coast ports amid worries the 45,000 dockworkers at those trade hubs will go on strike again if their union leader does not land a new contract with employers by a Jan. 15 deadline.】

item.title: 欧元区经济增长超出预期，但前景依然黯淡
item.description: 欧元区上一季度的经济增长快于预期，但特朗普上台后可能征收超额关税的威胁，以及与中国贸易紧张局势的升级，使得欧元区经济前景黯淡。【原文：The euro zone economy grew faster than expected last quarter but threats of oversized tariffs from a potential Trump presidency along with escalating trade tensions with China are keeping the outlook muted.】

item.title: 福特投资者急切盼望汽车制造商提高效率
item.description: 福特汽车公司首席执行官吉姆-法利（Jim Farley）未能完成提高传统汽油发动机业务效率的任务，本周迄今为止，该公司股价已下跌约 8%。【原文：Ford Motor stock has tumbled about 8% so far this week after the company faltered on CEO Jim Farley's mission to improve efficiency in its traditional gasoline-engine operations, whose profits the company needs to fund its expensive electric vehicle plans.】

item.title: 美国大选前货币波动激增
item.description: 由于投资者为美国总统大选做准备，可能导致经济政策发生重大变化和美元波动，衡量货币预期波动性的指标周三跳涨。【原文：Gauges of expected volatility in currencies jumped on Wednesday as investors braced for the U.S. presidential election, which could result in big changes to economic policy and swings in the dollar.】

item.title: 市场欢呼 Alphabet 财报，期指上涨；经济数据值得期待
item.description: 美国股指期货周三上涨，原因是Alphabet强劲的季度业绩提振了科技巨头的情绪，同时投资者也在等待衡量经济和劳动力市场强劲程度的关键数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Wednesday, as Alphabet's strong quarterly results buoyed sentiment around technology megacaps, while investors also awaited crucial data to gauge the strength of the economy and the labor market.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，斯泰兰特将召回超过 33,000 辆公羊卡车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，克莱斯勒母公司斯泰兰特将在美国召回约33,777辆Ram 1500皮卡车，原因是该车的电子稳定性控制系统存在问题。【原文：Chrysler parent Stellantis will recall about 33,777 Ram 1500 pickup trucks in the U.S., over a concern related to the electronic stability control system, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国 2024 年预算直播
item.description: 英国财政大臣蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将寻求让世界第六大经济体和首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的政府走上新的道路。【原文：British finance minister Rachel Reeves will seek to shift the world's sixth-biggest economy, and Prime Minister Keir Starmer's government, on to a new course.】

item.title: AMD股价暴跌，预测令关注人工智能的投资者失望
item.description: 先进微器件公司（Advanced Micro Devices）的股价周三下跌了 8%，原因是该芯片公司的收入预期未能打动那些希望从人工智能热潮中获得更大收益的投资者。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices shares fell 8% on Wednesday after the chip company's revenue forecast failed to impress investors looking for a bigger windfall from the AI boom.】

item.title: 前央行顾问称中国刺激政策应与改革齐头并进
item.description: 前央行顾问刘世锦在周三发表的讲话中说，中国的经济刺激政策可能会付出代价，而且必须与改革同时进行，以确保经济的可持续增长。【原文：China's stimulus efforts could come with a cost and they must be carried out alongside reforms to ensure sustainable economic growth, Liu Shijin, a former central bank adviser, said in remarks published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商吉利凭借新型混合动力技术向比亚迪发起挑战
item.description: 中国吉利汽车控股公司（Geely Automobile Holdings）周三发布了其最新的混合动力技术，该技术在燃油经济性和行驶里程方面均优于本土插电式混合动力技术冠军比亚迪（BYD）的技术。【原文：China's Geely Automobile Holdings took the wraps off its latest hybrid technology on Wednesday, boasting some better fuel economy and driving range figures than rival technology from local plug-in hybrid champion BYD , .】

item.title: 业绩不及预期，金巴利股价暴跌逾 14
item.description: 在意大利烈酒集团第三季度盈利不及分析师预期之后，金巴利股票在早盘交易中下跌超过 14%。【原文：Shares in Campari were down over 14% in early trading after the Italian spirits group missed analysts' third-quarter earnings expectations.】

item.title: 中国大型银行第三季度利润增长，净利息收益率受到挤压
item.description: 中国最大的贷款机构周三公布的第三季度利润有所增长，但部分机构的利润率有所下降。【原文：China's largest lenders posted a rise in third-quarter profits on Wednesday, although margins were slimmer for some.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司寻求将 Northvolt 赶出电动汽车电池合资企业
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周三表示，在 Northvolt 决定不再为其提供资金后，该公司将有权收购 Northvolt 在瑞典电池合资企业 NOVO Energy 中的股份。【原文：Volvo Cars said on Wednesday it will invoke a right to acquire Northvolt's shares in their Swedish battery joint venture, NOVO Energy, after Northvolt decided to no longer provide funding for it.】
